title: Midnight Echoes
synopsis: A journalist returns to her coastal hometown and uncovers a decades-old mystery linked to her family's past.

title: Glass City
synopsis: In a futuristic metropolis, a reluctant detective hunts a hacker who can rewrite memories.

title: The Last Rodeo
synopsis: An estranged father and daughter fight to save their family farm before a corporate buyout.

title: Neon Drift
synopsis: Street racers in Tokyo discover a smuggling ring hidden behind a glamorous racing circuit.

title: Silent Frequency
synopsis: A sound engineer notices a hidden signal in city noise and becomes the target of a shadowy group.

title: Forgotten Atlas
synopsis: A cartographer discovers a map to a vanished civilization and must decide what truths to reveal.
